headline.sub: Missionary jailed in N. Korea urges U.S. to help with his return
headline.main: Missionary jailed in N. Korea urges U.S. to help with his return

docs.snippet: Jailed U.S. missionary Kenneth Bae urges Washington to step up efforts to secure his release from North Korea nearly 15 months after his arrest. Deborah Gembara reports....
docs.lead_paragraph: Jailed U.S. missionary Kenneth Bae urges Washington to step up efforts to secure his release from North Korea nearly 15 months after his arrest. Deborah Gembara reports.

docs.snippet: Shani Davis' mother wanted her young son to pursue roller dance, while guards at the Chicago ice rink he frequented just wished he would slow down. A myriad of medals in a glorious decade of elite speed skating prove emphatically the American was ...
docs.lead_paragraph: Shani Davis' mother wanted her young son to pursue roller dance, while guards at the Chicago ice rink he frequented just wished he would slow down. A myriad of medals in a glorious decade of elite speed skating prove emphatically the American was right to do neither.

headline.print_headline: 14 Companies Bid to Destroy Syria Chemicals
headline.main: 14 Companies Bid to Destroy Syria Chemicals

docs.snippet: The Organization for the Prohibition of Chemical Weapons says 14 private sector companies have submitted bids to destroy chemicals removed from Syria as part of international efforts to dismantle Damascus' poison gas and nerve agent program....
docs.lead_paragraph: The Organization for the Prohibition of Chemical Weapons says 14 private sector companies have submitted bids to destroy chemicals removed from Syria as part of international efforts to dismantle Damascus' poison gas and nerve agent program.

headline.print_headline: US Rep. Lankford Announces Run for US Senate Seat
headline.main: US Rep. Lankford Announces Run for US Senate Seat

docs.snippet: Republican U.S. Rep. James Lankford announced his candidacy Monday for the U.S. Senate seat left open by Sen. Tom Coburn who said last week he would resign the post at the end of this congressional session....
docs.lead_paragraph: Republican U.S. Rep. James Lankford announced his candidacy Monday for the U.S. Senate seat left open by Sen. Tom Coburn who said last week he would resign the post at the end of this congressional session.
